body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Get metalcraft.
2. Play an Indomitable Archangel.
3. Attempt to cast a Glint Hawk. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Since the Glint Hawk's ability merely chooses an artifact on resolution, the Indomitable Archangel's shroud-providing shouldn't affect it. It does, and as a result the Glint Hawk is automatically sacrificed without providing any opportunity to return an artifact to your hand. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.23, OS X
